mainText:
I am just sending my condolences, as Steve Jobs was an icon in my eyes, 
without his amazing impact in creating perfection in computers i would 
have never gained such an interest in to film and tv. With out him 
creating such a revolutionary devices the world would not be the same...

He will be missed all over the world, and i know that writing this will 
not change anything, but i think that it is my generation that has to 
keep his spirit alive.
author: Jake
